rules_text:
Defender
When Drunau Egg enters, target player mills two cards.
{3}{U}{U}: Transform Drunau Egg. Activate only as a sorcery and only if an opponent has thirteen or more cards in their graveyard.
flavor_text2:
[i]“The portents are clear. All of Innistrad under rule of the tentacled god.”
—Runo Stromkirk[/i]
